newsitem.title: UK: Euro veg oils unchanged and quiet owing to holiday.
newsitem.headline: Euro veg oils unchanged and quiet owing to holiday.

text.p: Trading on the European vegetable oil market was at a standstill on Thursday with most of Europe, Malaysia and Indonesia closed for holidays.
Traders said they had no prices or business on their books and were calling crude palm oil cif Europe unchanged for want of any better offers.
The remainder of the market was unquoted.
The market is expected to open easier on Friday following the sharply lower opening in Chicago on the back of lacklustre USDA weekly export sale figures.
But whatever happens traders expect a slow day with many people turning Thursday's holiday into a long weekend.
